lead_paragraph: Golden State Warriors coach Steve Kerr said he smoked marijuana to treat the pain as he recovered from two back operations and believes it may be a better option for professional athletes than some painkillers.

headline.print_headline: Warriors Coach: Marijuana May Be Better Option Than Painkillers
headline.main: Warriors Coach: Marijuana May Be Better Option Than Painkillers

snippet: Golden State Warriors coach Steve Kerr said he smoked marijuana to treat the pain as he recovered from two back operations and believes it may be a better option for professional athletes than some painkillers....
